Uses of Class
com.terremark.api.VirtualMachine

Packages that use VirtualMachine
com.terremark Provides the classes necessary for interfacing with the Terremark API. 
 

Uses of VirtualMachine in com.terremark
 

Methods in com.terremark that return VirtualMachine
 VirtualMachine ComputePoolHandler.getVirtualMachineByID(String virtualMachineId)
          This call returns information regarding a specified virtual machines defined in an environment.
 VirtualMachine ComputePoolHandler.virtualMachineCreateBlank(String computePoolId, CreateBlankVirtualMachine obj)
          This method creates a new, blank virtual machine in the compute pool.
 VirtualMachine ComputePoolHandler.virtualMachineCreateCopy(String computePoolId, CopyVirtualMachine obj)
          This call creates a new virtual machine from an existing virtual machine in the compute pool.
 VirtualMachine ComputePoolHandler.virtualMachineCreateCopyIdentical(String computePoolId, CopyIdenticalVirtualMachine obj)
          This method creates a new virtual machine from an existing virtual machine in the compute pool.
 VirtualMachine ComputePoolHandler.virtualMachineCreateFromTemplate(String computePoolId, CreateVirtualMachine obj)
          This method creates a new virtual machine from a template in the compute pool.
 VirtualMachine ComputePoolHandler.virtualMachineImport(String computePoolId, ImportVirtualMachine obj)
          This call creates a virtual machine from a catalog item in the compute pool.
 

Methods in com.terremark with parameters of type VirtualMachine
 Task ComputePoolHandler.virtualMachineEdit(VirtualMachine obj)
          Method edits the name, description, and/or tags on a virtual machine defined in an environment.
